issue.title: [C++][Python] pyarrow.lib.ArrowIOError: Unable to load libjvm when using openjdk-8
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5989](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5989). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Getting `pyarrow.lib.ArrowIOError: Unable to load libjvm ` when trying to connect to hdfs using pyarrow with openjdk-8 installed. Fix available here <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4907>
